channel.title: Antlion Love?
channel.description:
Ok, I have been working on a mod of my own while following BMS (which looks amazing from what I have seen) and ran into an issue, considering the entire mod is baised around Bugbait and Portals, the issue is a major one
The Antlions yes they are friendly to me, but they wont follow me around when I have the bait out. i have Ai_nodes and Hint Nodes laid out, I have a hint group for a seprate Npc, behind glass. And for one it never messed around with my pets before, but they never follow me. They respond to the bug bait being fired, they'll go to the target, but they are very irresponcinve to me.
Thank you in advance ~Fooforce, (Aka the Amazing Elmo)

item.title: Antlion Love?
item.dc:creator: Fooforce
item.description:
Mangled*:

Make an env_global entity in your map and set the globalstate to antlion_allied.

Try that…

Ok they do like me now (and yes I did feed them recently) however they do not follow behind me, I have AI and HINT nodes special for the antlions, but they do not follow the player around. Is there anything else that would need to be done

Thanks for responding (and sorry it took so long for me to respond, computer in the chop shop [bizzarely for repair])

Read full topic
